title: Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail Formal Maxi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars STUNNING!
items.body: Absolutely love! This dress is so flattering and so comfortable. I am 5’2 & 130 pounds. I typically wear a small which is what I ordered and fit perfectly. The dress is great length and with the wrap band I didn’t feel self conscious about my midsection. Hid my little pouch perfectly. The open back is so flattering and exposes the perfect amount of back! Read more
items.author: Ashleigh

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Classy and sexy dress
items.body: This is a very nice quality dress. I love the style, super classy and sexy. Very comfortable as well. Has see-through sheer sleeves, as well as a long extra piece of fabric for the front to tie in a bow and that drops down to the bottom. It is true to size and fits very nicely. The back is also low cut. Read more
items.author: Shopgirl24

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a night out
items.body: I wore this to a holiday party and got so many compliments. It’s comfortable and it hugged my body so nice. I’m 5”1 and wore 4 inch heels and had no problem walking. Easy to dance in (I was getting my dance on). Because it’s back less I wore a sticky bra and it was perfect. The dress quality is awesome, and worth the price. Read more
items.author: Eva

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: This dress is beautiful and very flattering. The tie in the front sits in a perfect spot that I would not need shape wear. The dress buttons at the neck and it is very uncomfortable. I kept the dress on for 5 minutes and needed to take it off. I ended up returning the dress because of this. Read more
items.author: Alison Lasota

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars No.
items.body: This is a mix of mesh…. Layered mesh. It’s not as soft and smooth as the photo describes. You have to “figure” out where to put the “strands” along the waist. The dress could’ve did better if it was purely a polyester base….”90% polyester 5% spandex”…. It isn’t form fitting…. It’s supposed to look sophisticated and flattering…. It actually looks very “cheap”. The draping of the fabric isn’t accurate. Your best best is to get it tailored. Or altered. Read more
items.author: Mrs. Ming

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit like a glove.
items.body: Gorgeous on. The fit was perfect with just enough stretch. The opening in the back was high enough to wear shape-ware under. Not too long; it hit at the ankle. (5'4" ordered a Large). Read more
items.author: K. M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek dress, beautiful color - modest but still sexy
items.body: I’m 5'2", around 122 pounds, with a 36C bust and 28-inch waist. I was right at the top end of the small size range, but I went with the small since the fabric is stretchy, and it ended up being the right call. The fit is spot on. If I had gone bigger, it probably still would’ve been fine, but I really like how the small gives that sleek, pencil-style look. When I first pulled it out, I thought, “OK, this is kind of a mesh/tulle thing,” but once you put it on, it’s really flattering. It’s lined so you don’t have to worry about it being see-through, though you can see the outline of your nipples. That’s easy enough to fix with stick-on covers if you want. The sash is a fun touch because you can tie it however you want, and I like the open back. It gives you that covered-up front with just enough sexy in the back. My husband immediately gave it a thumbs up, so that’s always a good sign. One thing to note: because the skirt is fitted all the way down, you don’t get a long stride like you would if it had a slit. I don’t take big steps anyway, so it’s not a big deal for me. I can see myself wearing this more in the winter since it has sleeves, which makes more sense here in Florida. I got this one through the Amazon Vine program, but honestly, if I had bought it outright, I would’ve kept it. Read more
items.author: Trisha

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super flattering but
items.body: Super flattering! This dress is lined and soft. Pretty sure the other reviewer was correct about being unable to wrinkle this. It's stretchy and feels sturdy and well sewn. The fit's true to size. Sometimes that's all us ladies need though! If that's really what you're looking for, this dress may just be worth it to ya! This got my fiance's approval! Docked a star for those washing instructions. I'd expect that for something of a much higher quality. I personally, wouldn't drop 60$ on this at the store. Read more
items.author: Anne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve Cocktail Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
